name: Zelda Clone Tutorial - Executable
description:
I am currently writing a series of game dev tutorials that teach aspiring gamedevs how to create a Zelda clone. This is the progress we have made so far (as of 12/30/15). I am uploading this executable as part of a tutorial on publishing and distributing your game. If you like what you see, the tutorial series can be found here.

December '15 #1GAM Submission
